data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Robert Schelly, Tetsumi Takahashi, Roger Bills, Michio Hori (2007): The first case of aggressive mimicry among lamprologines in a new species of Lepidiolamprologus (Perciformes: Cichlidae) from Lake Tanganyika.
